head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LENHOFF, EDWARD S.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LENHOFF, EDWARD S.

block.p: LENHOFF-Edward S. Of 721 Old Bedford Rd, Concord, MA, died February 15, 1997, at Emerson Hospital, Concord. Longtime professor of Nuclear Biophysics at Harvard University for 30 years. Loving brother of Mrs. Gabriel (Carol) Kosakoff of New York City. Longtime companion of Mary Snay of Concord, MA. Graveside service will take place Tuesday at 12 noon at Beth Israel Cemetery, Clarksburg, MA. No calling hours. For information, The Flynn & Dagnoli-Montagna Home for Funerals, 74 Marshall Street, North Adams, MA.
